#summary AMFPHP service class documentation.

== Description ==

This class accesses user capabilities in the Moodle course context.

Necessary for managing what a particular user is allowed to do in the SWF Activity Module service classes.


== Methods ==

===get_capabilities()===
{{{
Access->get_capabilties($instance, $swfid);
}}}
Parameters:
{{{
$instance int - The course module ID
$swfid int - The SWF Activity Module instance ID
}}}
